entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:41 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -22.2°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local snow squalls over eastern sections. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 cm over eastern sections. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:43 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 08:43 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
